content.rendered:
Directed by Vishal Furia

Written by Vishal Furia. Vishal Kapoor

Star Nushrratt Bharuccha (Sakshi). Mita Vashisht (Bhanno Devi). Gracy Goswami (Small Girl). Tanuj Vyas (Yogeshwar). Saurabh Goyal (Hemant). Rajesh Jais (Kajla). Backagaindancer (Kaalu). Chobber Sidhu (Dialogue Writter). Pallavi Ajay (Rani (as Pallavi Ajay Patil)). Yaaneea Bharadwaj (Suneni). Bharat Shirsat (Pani Puri Wala). Sakshi Parihar (Suneni Dupe). Anjali Israni (Sakshi Dupe). Krish Lobo (Boy A Dupe). Lakshmi Narayan Bhatt (Goon 2). Achintya Choudhary (Boy B Dupe). Suyash Srivastava (Ngo Boy 2). Hayat Ali (Boy B). Devansh Malviya (Ngo Boy 1). Vasudha Sharma (Wife 1). Rehan Abid Ali (Priest). Manas Tondwalkar (Boy A). Rahul Sharma (Shadi Pandit). Aditi Sahu (Madhuri). Nirvighna Pathe (Boy C). Vidit Kaurav (Boyc Dupe). Arif Shaikh (Goon 1)

Language Hindi

Producers Zaid Ali. Antara Banerjee. Amit J. Chaudhary. Jack Davis. Jack Davis. Naved Farooqui. Alex Anthony Fernandes. Bhushan Kumar. Krishnan Kumar. Ritwick Maheshwari. Vikram Malhotra. Arif Shaikh. Shikhaa Sharma

Production Abundantia Entertainment .T-Series Films .Crypt TV
